name: finishLoading(with:data:redirect:)
desc: Causes the receiver to finish loading a resource for which a resource loader’s delegate took responsibility .DeprecatedThis method is deprecated. Use the following methods and properties instead: the response property to provide the response object, the redirect property when redirecting a request, invoking the dataRequest instance‘srespond(with:) method to provide data, and the finishLoading() method to indicate that loading is finished.
